home.title: Techco.lab | NETZSCH Digital Innovation Hub
home.description: Techco.lab builds industrial AI solutions for NETZSCH – connected platforms, predictive analytics, and digital experiences that transform manufacturing operations across 50+ countries.
home.keywords: Techco.lab, NETZSCH, digital innovation, technology careers Brazil, hybrid work, South Brazil tech jobs, Curitiba jobs, Pomerode jobs, CLT contract, profit sharing, wellness platform, health insurance, education subsidy, openenglish, NOA, Alura, food voucher, hybrid workplace, salary equity, tech recruiter, UI UX designer, data engineer, software developer, digital transformation, career growth, NETZSCH Group
home.serviceDescription: We develop connected platforms, AI-powered predictive analytics, intelligent digital interfaces, and real-time intelligence to transform manufacturing operations across 50+ countries.

careers.title: Techco.lab | Digital Innovation Careers at NETZSCH
careers.description: Join Techco.lab — NETZSCH's digital innovation hub. We are hiring technology professionals in a hybrid model in Southern Brazil. Enjoy CLT contract, health and dental insurance, profit sharing, wellness programs, hybrid work, education subsidy, meal vouchers and much more.

openGraph.title: Techco.lab | Digital Innovation Careers at NETZSCH
openGraph.description: Techco.lab connects innovation and technology at NETZSCH. We offer hybrid work, profit sharing, education support, and wellness programs in a collaborative culture.

twitter.title: Techco.lab | Careers at NETZSCH
twitter.description: Join the Techco.lab team — hybrid digital innovation careers in Southern Brazil with NETZSCH.

SEO.aiSummary: Techco.lab builds industrial AI solutions for NETZSCH, including connected platforms, predictive maintenance, smart interfaces, and real-time analytics that reduce downtime, optimize production, and accelerate digital transformation for industrial manufacturers across 50+ countries.

NotFound.title: Page not found
NotFound.description: The page you're looking for doesn't exist or has been moved. Let's get you back on track.

hero.subtitle: NETZSCH's innovation engine building connected platforms, AI analytics, and digital experiences for global industries.

techHub.description: Techco.lab is the innovation engine behind NETZSCH's digital evolution. Acting as a global technology hub, we accelerate change, create scalable solutions, and connect technology to real impact.

capabilities.subtitle: Explore how our digital capabilities transform vision into scalable industrial impact.
capabilities.featuredText: We shape NETZSCH's digital backbone through projects that unlock new possibilities for people, processes, and performance.

ai.title: Industrial AI
ai.description: We build AI systems that help factories and operations predict problems, optimize processes, and reduce downtime.

platforms.title: Connected Platforms
platforms.description: We develop platforms that connect equipment, data, and teams for real-time visibility and operational control.

interfaces.title: Digital Interfaces
interfaces.description: We create intuitive interfaces that put actionable insights in the hands of managers, technicians, and operators.

turningIdeas.title: Turning ideas into
turningIdeas.description: At Techco.lab, innovation starts with people. Our culture is built on curiosity, collaboration, and continuous learning — where every idea can create tangible change. We bring together cross-functional teams that combine engineering, design, and data expertise to develop meaningful solutions for industry, sustainability, and society.

locations.title: Spaces that inspire
locations.subtitle: We foster collaboration and creativity in two main locations in Brazil.

curitiba.title: Nex Coworking
curitiba.description: A collaborative environment where professionals shape the future of technology.

pomerode.title: NEM Headquarters
pomerode.description: Where engineering excellence meets digital transformation.

items.quote: Working closely with Techco.lab has shown how much value a highly skilled digital team can bring to a global organization like NETZSCH. Their mindset of experimentation, ownership, and continuous improvement accelerates how we innovate and deliver solutions around the world. I'm proud of how this team is shaping the future of our digital products.
items.author: Jens Niesner
items.role: CFO and Member of Executive Board of NETZSCH Group

items.quote: Techco.lab is where global industry meets bold digital talent. From Brazil to Germany and to the world, we are building platforms and digital solutions that streamline the entire group's digital processes. Here, your ideas don't stay local—they scale worldwide. Join a multicultural team that learns fast, grows fast, and supports our three Business Units. If you want your work to matter globally, Techco.lab is your place.
items.author: Paul Netzsch
items.role: Member of Executive Board of NETZSCH Group

preFooter.title: A place where you can make a difference
preFooter.subtitle: Ready to be part of this transformation?

whatWeDeliver.title: What we deliver
whatWeDeliver.subtitle: Our solutions power the next generation of industrial operations

platforms.title: Connected Platforms
platforms.description: Unified systems that connect machines, data, and people across global operations.

analytics.title: Predictive Analytics
analytics.description: AI-powered insights that predict maintenance needs and optimize production.

interfaces.title: Smart Interfaces
interfaces.description: Intuitive digital experiences that make complex operations simple.

realtime.title: Real-time Intelligence
realtime.description: Live dashboards and alerts that keep operations running at peak efficiency.

WhatWeDo.pageDescription: Digital strategy, software development, data & AI solutions, and experience design — discover how Techco.lab transforms NETZSCH through applied technology and innovation.
WhatWeDo.serviceName: Digital Transformation and Technology Innovation Services
WhatWeDo.serviceDescription: We offer digital strategy and consulting, cloud-ready software development, data and AI solutions with machine learning, and experience design (UX/UI) to transform global industrial operations.
WhatWeDo.title: What we do
WhatWeDo.subtitle: We focus on strategic and technical initiatives that shape the digital backbone of NETZSCH and unlock new opportunities for teams around the world.

strategy.title: Digital Strategy & Consulting
strategy.description: Discovery, value mapping, roadmaps, and delivery planning.

development.title: Software Development
development.description: Cloud-ready apps, microservices, secure data flows, and APIs.

data.title: Data & AI Solutions
data.description: Analytics, ML use-cases, automation, measurable outcomes.

design.title: Experience & Design
design.description: Research, UX/UI, design systems, adoption and usability.

projects.title: Latest
projects.subtitle: Environments that foster continuous innovation and networking.

items.title: IRIS BeadMills
items.description: Designed to modernize industrial operations, IRIS unites technology and design in a next-generation SaaS platform that reimagines Human-Machine Interfaces from the ground up.

items.title: Data-Driven Strategy
items.description: At A&T, the challenge was to free the Business Strategy team from time-consuming manual work in data collection and processing. The Techco.lab team mapped processes, connected multiple data sources, and built a new data warehouse from the ground up. The result: a faster, smarter operation with automated analytics that transformed manual effort into strategic thinking time and opened new opportunities for business insights.

items.title: Commercial Intelligence for Sustainable Growth
items.description: In PBS, the goal was to support the Spare Parts business in identifying customer segmentation, ideal purchase timing, and upselling potential. Techco.lab developed a BI solution that delivers real-time, actionable insights, enabling the sales team to act with precision and personalization. The impact is clear: increased revenue from customer reactivation, reduced churn, and a more proactive, data-driven management approach.

items.title: Control and Predictability on a Global Scale
items.description: In Grinding & Dispersing, Techco.lab led a robust BI initiative for the Controlling team, integrating Sales, Billing, and Revenue Forecast data from multiple systems and currencies. Overcoming complex technical challenges, the team delivered dynamic dashboards that cut analysis time from half an hour to just seconds. Today, the unit benefits from a reliable, global view of commercial performance, empowering fast, confident, and strategic decision-making.

items.title: Customer Portal — Digital Experience for After-Sales Excellence
items.description: The Customer Portal simplifies the end-to-end customer journey by unifying spare-parts identification, ordering, equipment information, and knowledge resources in one platform. Integrated with SAP and Salesforce, it increases efficiency, reduces support needs, and empowers smarter decisions for customers and service teams.
results: Improved customer autonomy through intuitive self-service
Greater accuracy in spare parts selection and ordering
Consistent digital experience across regions and teams

items.title: ServiceNow
items.description: The platform is used as a strategic pillar to digitize processes that were previously manual and decentralized. With it, we reduce repetitive steps, eliminate rework, create digital and connected workflows between departments and systems within the company, always supporting our business areas with scalable, sustainable solutions tailored to the needs of the company and its employees.
results: An average of 2,750+ monthly IT requests (IT365)
An average of 1,000+ monthly HR requests (HRSD)
An average of 350+ monthly requests for demand and project management (SPM)
Less rework and greater visibility at each stage of the processes

items.quote: Techco.lab is a place that breathes technology, where curiosity drives innovation and every challenge fuels professional growth on a global stage. It's a collaborative environment that pushes us to think boldly and build solutions with real global impact.
items.author: Alberto Reuters

items.quote: As the founder of Techco.lab, I'm impressed by the practical mindset and flexibility of Brazilian tech professionals. Their strong qualifications and commitment to quality meet – and often exceed – global standards. This is what makes Techco.lab an exceptional partner: a team combining expertise with a can-do attitude to deliver real results.
items.author: Stefan Lautenschlager
items.role: Head of Data & Analytics NETZSCH Group

preFooter.title: The future of digital innovation starts here —
preFooter.subtitle: Ready to be part of this transformation?

OurCulture.pageDescription: Discover Techco.lab's culture: values of ownership and collaboration, Great Place to Work® certification, comprehensive benefits (CLT, profit sharing, health insurance, education, hybrid work), and an environment where innovation thrives.
OurCulture.serviceDescription: A Great Place to Work® certified culture with comprehensive benefits — CLT contract, profit sharing, health insurance, education subsidy, hybrid work, and wellness programs.

hero.title: What we
hero.subtitle: We focus on strategic and technical initiatives that shape the digital backbone of NETZSCH and unlock new opportunities for teams around the world.

values.title: Ownership
values.description: We own the outcome and value the bat.

values.title: Collaboration
values.description: We debate hard, decide fast, deliver together.

values.title: Achieve
values.description: We pause to recognize wins — from launches to tough fixes.

gptw.title: We're a
gptw.description: At NETZSCH, building high-impact technology starts with building an environment where people can thrive. Our GPTW certification reflects exactly that: recognition from those who live our culture every day — our employees. It confirms that we foster wellbeing, continuous learning, respect, and excellence, creating the ideal foundation for strong, innovative teams ready for the future.

milestones.title: Milestones
milestones.subtitle: We don't just ship and move on. We take time to recognize the effort and celebrate together.

items.title: Launch days & retros
items.description: Every product launch is followed by a team retrospective to celebrate wins and learn from challenges.

items.title: Off-sites & team awards
items.description: Annual team off-sites and quarterly awards recognize outstanding contributions and foster team bonding.

items.title: Friday wins
items.description: End each week by sharing wins, big or small. It's our ritual to acknowledge progress and momentum.

benefits.title: Why work at
benefits.subtitle: Here at Techco.lab, we value people as much as innovation — offering challenging projects, professional growth, and a complete package of benefits for your well-being.
benefits.discoverTitle: Discover the benefits you will receive by joining us.

items.title: CLT Contract
items.description: Full employment benefits and stability under Brazil's official labor law framework.

items.title: Profit Sharing (PPL)
items.description: Receive a share of the company's annual profits as part of our collective success.

items.title: Service Award
items.description: Celebrate your milestones with special recognition for years of contribution.

items.title: Program of ideas reward
items.description: An internal program that celebrates innovation — win prizes for your best ideas.

items.title: Health & Dental Insurance
items.description: Comprehensive medical and dental coverage for your peace of mind.

items.title: Wellness Platform
items.description: Take care of your body and mind with GoGood's health and wellness resources.

items.title: Pharmacy Discounts
items.description: Get special discounts at partnered pharmacies for your everyday health and wellness needs.

items.title: Fuel Discounts
items.description: Enjoy reduced prices when filling up at selected partner gas stations across the network.

items.title: Education Subsidy
items.description: We invest in your growth with partial funding for continued learning.

items.title: OpenEnglish Access
items.description: Free full access to the OpenEnglish platform to boost your language skills.

items.title: NOA & Alura
items.description: Your unified hub for quick, practical skill growth — anytime, anywhere.

items.title: Hybrid Work
items.description: Flexible schedule with no mandatory office days — balance life your way.

items.title: Referral Bonus
items.description: Earn rewards for helping us find great new teammates.

items.title: Food Voucher
items.description: Prepaid credit card to be used in supermarkets or restaurants.

items.title: Salary Equity
items.description: Transparent, fair, and competitive pay based on role and performance.

items.title: Equipment
items.description: Work comfortably with provided laptops and essential peripherals.

realDeal.title: The
realDeal.description: We're not promising ping-pong tables or fake "unlimited vacation." What we promise is straightforward benefits, room to grow, flexibility when you need it, and a workplace where you don't dread Mondays.
realDeal.highlight: We invest in people because good people are hard to find.

testimonials.title: In their own
testimonials.subtitle: A few words from the people who make this place what it is.

items.quote: Being part of Techco.lab as part of my trainee program has been an amazing experience. It was my first time in Brazil and everyone welcomed me with open arms. The team is fun, helpful, and makes work genuinely exciting! Every day brings a new challenge and I'm constantly learning through hands-on projects and great mentorship. Being surrounded by such talented and experienced people encourages me to keep growing and developing.
items.author: Linh Dao

items.quote: I was already part of NETZSCH when I had the honor of becoming Techco.lab's first employee. The work here is dynamic, with challenges that push us to our full potential and add value both personally and professionally. I've experienced unique opportunities and it's rewarding to see how much this journey has contributed to my development.
items.author: Ana Leite

items.quote: Joining Techco.lab in 2023 was a turning point in my career. The culture, shared values, and the opportunity to work with such talented and creative people push me to grow every day. Our team strikes the right balance between focus and fun: we laugh a lot, we collaborate deeply, and when it's time to deliver, everyone shows up with their best. Being part of this environment and contributing to meaningful solutions for our internal customers has been genuinely fulfilling.
items.author: Kelvin Okuda

items.quote: Working at Techco.lab changed the way I grow and learn. Coming from chaotic agency life, I found a culture that is honest, collaborative, and never judgmental. People teach you what you don't know and diving into the software and equipment pushed me into engineering topics I never imagined exploring. What makes Techco.lab special is the feeling of building something bigger together. Ideas are heard, the team is open, and the impact is real.
items.author: Gabriel Oliveira

items.quote: Being able to connect people with their desire to work at a good technology company is an achievement that Techco.lab has allowed me to accomplish. When there is focus on people, culture, and the future — that's where it all begins. The constant team unity and values create growth that I can witness in every professional and myself along the way.
items.author: Julia Fritzke

items.quote: As a data analyst at Techco.lab, I've had the opportunity to work on globally impactful projects. The company's investment in growth through certifications and its openness to creative problem-solving has been instrumental in my development. Additionally, collaborating with such skilled and engaged colleagues has been one of the best parts of working here. The team combines technical excellence with a collaborative and fun spirit, supported by leadership that genuinely encourages innovation. It's an environment where I feel excited to bring my best ideas.
items.author: Lucas Shizuno

items.quote: Working at Techco.lab means being part of an environment that truly values people and innovation. The team is highly qualified, collaborative, and always willing to share knowledge, creating a welcoming space where everyone feels supported and recognized. The company invests in continuous learning and encourages creativity in problem-solving, providing the right tools to grow. Here, we work on strategic and high-impact projects where our ideas matter. What sets Techco.lab apart is its human leadership. Leaders who inspire, empower, and create an environment where innovation happens naturally — dynamic, creative, and stimulating.
items.author: Daniel Lima
items.role: BIA Business Partner - Business Intelligence & Analytics

PrivacyPolicy.pageDescription: Learn how Techco.lab and NETZSCH collect, process, and protect your personal data. Information about cookies, analytics, contact forms, and your rights under GDPR.
PrivacyPolicy.serviceDescription: We ensure the protection of visitors' personal data with GDPR compliance practices, consent management, and technical security measures.
PrivacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
PrivacyPolicy.subtitle: How we protect your data
PrivacyPolicy.intro: Thank you for visiting the Techco.lab website. Protecting your personal data is important to NETZSCH. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect and process personal data in connection with the use of this website.

controller.title: I. CONTROLLER
controller.description: The responsible entity (controller) for data processing on this website is:

company.name: Erich NETZSCH B.V. & Co. Holding KG

contact.description: For matters specifically related to this website, including the exercise of data subject rights, please contact:
contact.title: Techco.lab Privacy Contact

dataProcessing.title: II. DATA PROCESSED WHEN VISITING THE WEBSITE
dataProcessing.description: When you access the Techco.lab website for informational purposes only, your browser automatically transmits certain technical data. We process:
dataProcessing.purpose: Purpose: to enable the website to function, maintain security, and improve performance.
dataProcessing.legalBasis: Legal basis: Art. 6 (1) (f) GDPR – legitimate interest in ensuring a secure and functional website.
dataProcessing.note: This technical data is evaluated only in aggregate form. We do not use it to personally identify you.

cookies.title: III. COOKIES AND CONSENT MANAGEMENT
cookies.description: We use cookies. Cookies are small text files stored on your device that help provide essential website functionalities and remember your preferences.
cookies.usercentrics: We use Usercentrics (Usercentrics A/S, Denmark) to obtain and document your consent regarding the use of non-essential cookies.
cookies.purpose: Purpose: manage consent preferences and ensure compliance with data protection legislation.
cookies.revoke: You may refuse or revoke your consent at any time via the "Cookie Settings" link displayed on the website. Please note that disabling cookies may limit certain website functionalities.

analytics.title: IV. GOOGLE ANALYTICS 4 (GA4)
analytics.description: We use Google Analytics 4 to analyze how visitors interact with the website. With your consent, Google Analytics processes information such as page views, session statistics, device and browser data, and approximate location.
analytics.purpose: Purpose: statistical analysis and continuous improvement of the Techco.lab website.
analytics.activation: Google Analytics is activated only after consent is provided via Usercentrics.
analytics.retention: Data retention: Google Analytics data is configured to be retained for 2 months.
analytics.signals: Google Signals: DISABLED – we do not use Google Signals or personalized advertising features in GA4.

searchConsole.title: V. GOOGLE SEARCH CONSOLE
searchConsole.description: We use Google Search Console, a service provided by Google Ireland Limited (Gordon House, Barrow Street, Dublin 4, Ireland), to monitor and optimize the visibility and performance of our website in Google Search results.
searchConsole.details:
Google Search Console provides us with aggregated and technical information, such as:
	•	search queries leading to our website
	•	number of impressions and clicks
	•	click-through rates
	•	technical indexing or crawling errors
	•	general device and performance metrics
searchConsole.aggregated: This data is provided in aggregated form and does not allow us to identify individual visitors.
searchConsole.noCookies: No cookies are set by Google Search Console on our website and no direct tracking of individual users takes place through this service.
searchConsole.purpose: Purpose: website performance monitoring, search engine optimization, and technical stability.
searchConsole.legalBasis: Legal basis: Art. 6(1)(f) GDPR – legitimate interest in maintaining and improving the discoverability and proper functioning of our website.
searchConsole.privacyLink:
Further information can be found in Google's Privacy Policy:
https://policies.google.com/privacy

maps.title: VI. GOOGLE MAPS
maps.description: The website offers embedded maps via the Google Maps API.
maps.purpose: Purpose: display geographic locations and facilitate navigation for users.
maps.loading: Embedded maps are loaded only after consent confirmation via Usercentrics.

contact.title: VII. CONTACT FORM AND INQUIRIES
contact.description: On the website, you can contact Techco.lab through the contact page. If you submit an inquiry, we will process the personal data you actively provide:
items: Resume and other information contained in uploaded files
contact.voluntary: Submitting a resume is voluntary. If you choose to submit it, it will be used exclusively to evaluate your profile in relation to your inquiry.
contact.purpose: Purpose: respond to user inquiries and address the issues presented.
contact.legalBasis: Legal basis: Art. 6 (1) (b) GDPR – processing necessary for contract execution or pre-contractual measures; or Art. 6 (1) (f) GDPR – legitimate interest in effective communication.

recruitment.title: VIII. CANDIDATE MANAGEMENT VIA SMARTRECRUITERS
recruitment.description: This website displays job opportunities obtained via the SmartRecruiters API. Vacancies are made available for informational purposes only.
recruitment.redirect: If you decide to apply for a position, you will be redirected to the SmartRecruiters platform. All candidate data processing occurs in accordance with the specific privacy notices available on that platform.

recipients.title: IX. RECIPIENTS OF PERSONAL DATA
recipients.description: We may share personal data with service providers who support the operation of the website, specifically:
items: Hosting provider (virtual machine infrastructure in Brazil)
recipients.note: These providers act as processors or independent controllers, depending on the service. We do not sell personal data to third parties.

transfers.title: X. INTERNATIONAL DATA TRANSFERS
transfers.description: Some of our service providers process technical data in countries outside the European Union or the European Economic Area, including the United States.
transfers.safeguards: When required by applicable law, such transfers are protected by appropriate mechanisms, such as the European Union's Standard Contractual Clauses.

security.title: XI. DATA SECURITY
security.description: We use HTTPS/SSL encryption and appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect the website and any submitted personal data against loss, misuse, or unauthorized access.

rights.title: XII. YOUR RIGHTS
rights.description: Depending on your location and applicable law (including GDPR), you have the right to:
items: Confirmation and access to your personal data (Art. 15 GDPR)
Rectification of inaccurate or incomplete data (Art. 16)
Data portability, when processing is based on consent or contract (Art. 20)
Objection to processing based on legitimate interest (Art. 21)
Withdrawal of consent at any time (Art. 7(3))
rights.exercise: To exercise any of these rights, please contact: techcolab@netzsch.com
rights.complaint: You also have the right to lodge a complaint with a competent data protection supervisory authority.

contactSection.title: CONTACT
contactSection.description: For any questions related to this Privacy Policy or your personal data, please contact directly:
contactSection.address: Address: Vila Itoupava, Blumenau, SC, and Techco.lab Germany

Imprint.pageDescription: Legal information for Erich NETZSCH B.V. & Co. Holding KG — directors, commercial registration, content responsibility, copyright, and advertising policy.
Imprint.serviceDescription: Legal and compliance information for Erich NETZSCH B.V. & Co. Holding KG, including commercial registration, content responsibility, and copyright policies.
Imprint.title: Legal Notice
Imprint.subtitle: Legal information

company.name: Erich NETZSCH B.V. & Co. Holding KG

directors.title: Managing Directors:
directors.names: Moritz Netzsch, Paul Netzsch, Jens Niessner
directors.taxNumber: Tax identification number according to §27a of the tax law: DE 133914533

responsible.title: Responsible for content according to § 55 Abs.
responsible.subtitle: 2 RStV:
responsible.name: Yann Jeschke
responsible.company: Erich NETZSCH B.V. & Co. Holding KG

liability.title: Liability
liability.content1: As a service provider, we are responsible for the content of these sites in accordance with general provisions (cf. § 7 paragraph 1 DDG). We are not obligated to monitor third-party content that is transmitted or stored (cf. §§ 8-10 DDG). This does not affect the obligations to remove or block the use of information in accordance with general laws. However, such liability is only possible from the time of knowledge of a specific infringement. If we become aware of any legal violations, the corresponding content will be removed immediately.
liability.content2: The pages of this site contain links to external third-party websites. We have no influence over the content of these sites and, for this reason, cannot accept any responsibility for them; nor do we adopt such content as our own. The respective provider or operator of the sites is responsible for the content of the linked sites. We checked the linked sites at the time of linking and did not identify any illegal content. We cannot reasonably be required to permanently monitor the content of linked pages without any specific reason to do so. However, if we become aware of any legal violations, the corresponding links will be removed immediately.

copyright.title: Copyright
copyright.content1: The content and works on these pages are subject to German copyright law. We would like to point out that any reproduction/copying, editing, distribution and any type of use outside the limits of copyright law requires the written consent of the respective copyright holder.
copyright.content2: Third-party copyrights are respected on these pages. However, should any copyright infringement occur, please inform us. As soon as infringements become known, all content in question will be deleted immediately.

advertising.title: Opposition to Advertising
advertising.content: Finally, we hereby object to the use of the contact data published here in the legal notice for sending unsolicited advertising.

Footer.tagline: Connecting talent and innovation to accelerate NETZSCH's global digital transformation

FAQ.title: Frequently Asked
FAQ.subtitle: Everything you need to know about working at Techco.lab

items.question: What is the work model at Techco.lab?
items.answer: We offer a hybrid work model with flexible schedules. You can work from home most days and visit our offices in Curitiba or Pomerode when needed for team collaboration, meetings, or events. There are no mandatory office days.

items.question: What benefits does Techco.lab offer?
items.answer: We provide a comprehensive benefits package including CLT contract, profit sharing (PPL), health and dental insurance, wellness platform (GoGood), education subsidy, OpenEnglish access, NOA & Alura learning platforms, food voucher, referral bonus, and company equipment.

items.question: Where are Techco.lab offices located?
items.answer: We have two main locations in Southern Brazil: Nex Coworking in Curitiba (PR), a collaborative tech environment, and NEM Headquarters in Pomerode (SC), where engineering excellence meets digital transformation.

items.question: What technologies does Techco.lab work with?
items.answer: We work with cutting-edge technologies including cloud platforms (Azure, AWS), SAP integrations, Power BI, Salesforce, ServiceNow, React, TypeScript, Python, and various AI/ML frameworks for industrial applications.

items.question: How is the hiring process at Techco.lab?
items.answer: Our hiring process typically includes an initial screening, technical assessment relevant to the role, interviews with the team and leadership, and a final offer. We value cultural fit, technical skills, and growth mindset throughout the process.

items.question: What career growth opportunities exist at Techco.lab?
items.answer: We invest heavily in professional development through education subsidies, certifications, learning platforms (NOA, Alura, OpenEnglish), mentorship programs, and exposure to global projects. You'll work on impactful solutions that reach 50+ countries.

Differentiators.title: What Makes Us
Differentiators.subtitle: Discover why Techco.lab is the ideal place to build your career in technology and innovation.

global.title: Global Impact
global.description: Your work reaches 50+ countries. Build solutions that transform manufacturing operations worldwide, not just local projects.

industry.title: Industry 4.0 Pioneer
industry.description: Work on real industrial AI, IoT, and digital transformation projects that shape the future of manufacturing.

growth.title: Accelerated Growth
growth.description: Education subsidies, certifications, learning platforms, and exposure to cutting-edge technologies accelerate your career.

team.title: World-Class Team
team.description: Collaborate with talented professionals from Brazil, Germany, and around the world in a multicultural environment.

innovation.title: True Innovation
innovation.description: We don't just talk about innovation. We build industrial AI, predictive analytics, and connected platforms that solve real problems.

stability.title: Stability + Startup Mindset
stability.description: Enjoy the stability of a 150+ year old German group while working with the agility and innovation of a tech startup.
